entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Contrecoeur
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:07 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
